user_input: So please create for me methane profiles for the TYNDP 2026 scenarios and please include all scenarios, split the nodes, you don't need to use a plexus mark.

default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

function_args.user_input: Generate methane profiles for the TYNDP 2026 study across all scenarios with nodes split; do not apply any PLEXOS mark/tag.

tasks.description: Generate methane profiles for the TYNDP 2026 study across all scenarios with nodes split; do not apply any PLEXOS mark/tag.
